name: Fight For Justice
description: CZ said “Fight For Justice” — so we made it real. $FFJ is the people’s meme-token built to crush FUD and powered by conviction. Fair launched on Four.Meme — no presale, no private sale, no insiders. 100% community driven and fueled by memes, chaos, and the unbreakable spirit of those who refuse to fold. Justice isn’t bought — it’s minted on-chain forever, by the people and for the culture worldwide. ⚔️
